sentences.sContent: Discussion is the anvil upon which the spark of truth is struck.
sentences.sContent_eng: Discussion is the anvil upon which the spark of truth is struck.
sentences.sCn: 辩论是生出真理火花的铁砧（辩论出真理）。

sentences.sContent: Die setters select dies for forging according to work order and specifications; position align and bolt dies to ram and anvil of power presses and hammers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Die setters select dies for forging according to work order and specifications; position align and bolt dies to ram and anvil of power presses and hammers.
sentences.sCn: 模具制定者根据工作秩序和规格选择模具进行锻造；将模具对准并拴紧在动力压力机和锤子的撞锤和铁砧。

trans.tranOther: a heavy iron block on which pieces of hot metal are shaped using a hammer
